basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Clostridium clostridiforme ATCC25537, C. perfringens, Eubacterium ruminentium ATCC17233, Lachnospira multiperus ATCC19207, L. vitulinus ATCC27783, Lactobacillus ruminis ATCC27780, Ruminococcus albus SY3, Streptococcus bovis ATCC33317, Listeria ivanovii 80, L. gray 83.
